Package fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter

Class TimeManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.TimeManagement
  • public class TimeManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    The class TimeManagement manages the relationship between the silulated time and the real time of the underlying operating system.

    Description

    It allow to perform simulations in accelerated time compared to the real time.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : October 18, 2016

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
